# Chris Misztur

> Chris Misztur is the President & Founder of Mr. IIoT, specializing in building Smart Factories, both real and virtual. With over two decades of experience, he empowers businesses to thrive through digital Industry 4.0 transformation services and innovative IoT solutions.

Based in the Greater Chicago Area, Chris brings 20+ years of expertise in integrating business systems into manufacturing processes. He is known for developing the "5C" closed-loop feedback approach to IIoT implementation and holds patents in embedded systems for manufacturing. His focus areas include machine connectivity, data acquisition, system integration, and analytics for high-throughput production environments.
